title: Product Management System
description: A full-stack product management web application
body:
Minimal dashboard and admin panel that allows Adding and viewing products with the ability to search for products by name or catergory. 
MVC structure is used, the frontend is built with React and Vite, while the backend is built with PHP. The application uses MySql for data storage. The application is fully responsive and has a user-friendly interface.
Lazy loading and pagination are applied in the frontend and backend side for better performance and scalability.

title: Budget Buddy
body: A full-stack Expense Tracker web application that allows users to track their expenses and income. The frontend is built with React and Vite, while the backend is built with Express.js. The application uses MySql for data storage. The application is fully responsive and has a user-friendly interface.

title: Password Generator
body:
This is a tool to generate secure passwords built with vanilla JavaScript. The user can select the length of the password and choose from a variety of character types to include. The password is then generated and the user can copy the password to their clipboard.
This tool is fully responsive and works on all devices and built with potential to be integrated in register pages of other projects.

title: Task Tracker
body:
In this todo list web application I have depended on browser local storage to save user tasks per device. The website is fully responsive and built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, and Motion library which facilitates animation creation. 
The website allows users to add and delete tasks, as well as mark them as completed. The tasks are stored in the browser's local storage, so they persist even after the page is refreshed.

title: MovieLand
body: A front-end for a movie library website that allows users to browse movies. The website is fully responsive and built with React and styled using CSS. The website fetches data from an API and displays it in a user-friendly way.

title: ECommerce
body:
A full-stack project for an Ecommerce website that allows user to browse products, add them to cart, and recieve a confirmation email then checkout. The website is fully responsive. The frontend is built with Next.JS, TailwindCSS, and HyperUI. 
The backend is built with Strapi which facilitates the adminstration process by offering a dashboard to manage products, orders, and users. It has cloudinary integrated for optimizing images. I used Resend to handle sending emails to customers.

title: Flappy Bird
body: A browser-based implementation of the classic Flappy Bird game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The game features simple mechanics where the player controls a bird that must navigate through gaps between pipes without colliding. The game includes collision detection, score tracking, and responsive controls for an engaging user experience.

title: ChatMe
body: This video conference applications allow user to create and join rooms to chat, voice call, and video call. This website is empowered by Zegocloud API and UIKits.
